Review Text: Dries to powder, like clay. Re-wet it then after a minute, it loosened up and could be torn off. Didnt hydrate, just dried out my skin. Didn't notice any lightening of my skin.
Review Title: Dries hard. Re-wet then tears off. Faux fragrances

reference_summary:
Nano Botanix | Recovery Night Gel Moisturizer - with Hyaluronic Acid, Dual Peptides, and Color Correction - plus Aloe, Licorice, and Green Tea Extracts - Recover and Repair - 1.7 OZ (50mL)
Nano Botanix
{'Brand': 'Nano Botanix', 'Unit Count': '1.70 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '6.46 x 1.5 x 1.42 inches; 1.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '850034727271'}
There's really no fragrance which is kind of a bummer BUT the gel is light weight, soaks in well and hydrates beautifully.  I love this product line and tried this as an alternative to the night serum. I love both.  This seems to absorb quicker into my skin. Leaves no greasy residue,  not sticky. Super soft. I highly recommend this and all of their products.  I'm 54 and am enjoying more glowing, youthful looking skin.
After 2 weeks I can see a nice decrease in fine lines
GOMAY Hydrating Amino Acid Foaming Facial Cleanser, Daily Face Wash for Makeup Remover with Face Cleansing Brush
GO MAY
{'Brand': 'GO MAY', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Material Type Free': 'Oil-free,Soap-free', 'Unit Count': '5.00 Fl Oz', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 6 inches; 8.96 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GM-FC03', 'UPC': '633183294814'}
Great on sensitive skin. I love the scrubber. Soft silicone like fingers that massage your skin as you wash. All in one,  I love it.  Easy to dispense and fits well in hand. Cap to keep it sterile.  Great product. Great value for the money. Not harsh but deep cleaning.
Easy to use, no fragrance,  deep clean

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Age Group**: 54 years old
- **Skin Care Focus**: Continues to prioritize hydration, recovery, and repair in facial care, with an increasing emphasis on maintaining moisture balance.
- **Preferred Product Characteristics**: Values lightweight, non-greasy formulations suitable for sensitive skin. Recent experiences indicate a growing sensitivity to products with fragrances, as a recent purchase was noted for its faux fragrances and drying effects.
- **Product Usage**: Active user of night moisturizers and serums, recently integrating a daily face wash, indicating a commitment to a thorough skincare routine. The latest interaction reveals a need for products that not only cleanse but also hydrate effectively.
- **Scent Preference**: Neutral towards fragrance, now leaning more towards unscented formulations after a disappointing experience with scented products that did not perform well.
- **Overall Satisfaction**: While generally high in satisfaction, recent experiences reflect a careful evaluation of product effectiveness, especially in terms of hydration and overall skin appearance.
- **Brand Loyalty**: Maintains a loyalty to brands that consistently deliver effective solutions and fits seamlessly within their skincare routine.
- **Evaluation of Products**: Engages in thoughtful assessments of product performance, particularly in achieving hydration and improving skin texture. Recent feedback suggests a critical view towards products that fail to meet expectations of moisturizing claims.

This updated profile reaffirms the user's commitment to quality skincare that effectively addresses aging and hydration needs, while being mindful of product formulation and usability.
